overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto maintains an active presence across multiple social media platforms, engaging a diverse audience primarily on LinkedIn, BlueSky, and Mastodon. With a total of 3,580 followers and a focus on academic and research-oriented content, the engagement is reflective of a niche, scholarly community interested in computational social science and disinformation studies.
